name: Aurora Borealis
description:
Aurora Borealis walks you through a confused world of what's real and what isn't. I've created a shoe remote controller to play this game. There are two shoes and five pads (looking left, right, up, down and moving forward)  to navigate through the scenes.

The object of the game is to explore the world of Aurora Borealis while finding your way to the green lights in order to continue to the next level.

Have fun!!
